name: Trench Hounds
description:
This game was made in under a week for the Bullet Hell Jam.

Trench Hounds is a delicate dance through hell on earth where bodies pile up and the bullets never stop. Command your army of trench hounds to push forward by carving a path with their bodies as meat-shields through no man’s land and an onslaught of enemy ordnance so that you may pass through safely. Don’t worry about how many it takes. They're just resources.
